doc:
Audrey White https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Audrey_White 0 Margaret Audrey White (2 November 1927 – 8 November 2014), later Lady Wardington, was a red-headed English model who was refused a job as a BBC announcer in case her powerful looks "alarmed timid men from Wigan and country districts." Later she had a career in fashion journalism before concentrating on charity work. Margaret_Audrey_White ( 2_November_1927 – 8_November_2014 ) , later Lady_Wardington , was a_red-headed_English_model who was_refused a_job as a_BBC_announcer in case her_powerful_looks " alarmed_timid_men from Wigan_and_country_districts . " Later she had a_career in fashion_journalism before concentrating on charity_work .
